name: Raza Khawaja
greeting: Hey! Nice to meet you. I'm
intro: I'm a UX designer and researcher with a software engineering background. I have a Master's degree in UX from Purdue, a Bachelor's in Comptuer Science from LUMS and have worked at companies such as OneSignal and Educative in the past.
meta_description: Raza Khawaja is a UX designer with a software engineering background.
